title: Can not start new node with /usr/local/bin/op-node  command
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

Logs for opt_geth and opt_node are abnormal.

ssh root@172.17.0.8
cd /opt


root@172.17.0.8:/opt# /usr/local/bin/geth version
Geth
Version: 0.1.0-unstable
Git Commit: b9c6d36ae9b84ef82430311ddf03dc16f9be505b
Upstream Version: 1.12.0-stable
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.20.7
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=

run command :

```
geth --datadir /opt \
--ws \
--ws.port=8546 \
--ws.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--ws.origins='*'  \
--ws.api=debug,eth,txpool,net,engine   \
--http.api=web3,debug,eth,txpool,net,engine \
--http \
--http.port=8545 \
--http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--http.vhosts="\*" \
--http.corsdomain="\*" \
--authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--authrpc.jwtsecret=/opt/jwt.txt \
--authrpc.port=8551 \
--authrpc.vhosts="\*" \
--verbosity=3 \
--rollup.disabletxpoolgossip=true \
--rollup.sequencerhttp=https://mainnet-sequencer.optimism.io/ \
--nodiscover \
--syncmode=full \
--maxpeers=0
```

log-info:

--------------------------------------------


[op_node]

run command :

	op-node --l1=http://172.17.0.8:8545  --l2=http://172.17.0.8:8551 --network=mainnet --l2.jwt-secret=/opt/jwt.txt --rpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --rpc.port=8545 

log Info:

t=2023-08-31T16:33:33+0000 lvl=info msg="Initializing Rollup Node"
INFO [08-31|16:33:33.926] Rollup Config                            l2_chain_id=10 l2_network=mainnet l1_chain_id=1 l1_network=mainnet l2_start_time=1,686,068,903 l2_block_hash=0xdbf6a80fef073de06add9b0d14026d6e5a86c85f6d102c36d3d8e9cf89c2afd3 l2_block_number=105,235,063 l1_block_hash=0x438335a20d98863a4c0c97999eb2481921ccd28553eac6f913af7c12aec04108 l1_block_number=17,422,590 regolith_time="@ genesis"
ERROR[08-31|16:33:33.968] Error initializing the rollup node       err="failed to fetch header by num 17422590: not found"
ERROR[08-31|16:33:33.970] Unable to create the rollup node         error="failed to fetch header by num 17422590: not found"
CRIT [08-31|16:33:33.970] Application failed                       message="failed to fetch header by num 17422590: not found"



**System Specs:**
 - OS: ubuntu 20.04

Is there any information that can help me? pls.
Have you download data?   This is typically because no data was found under the path /opt in geth --datadir.
